snippet.title: Plane crash lands in Clyde North
snippet.content:
A PERSON is trapped inside a small plane that has crash-landed southeast of Melbourne. Paramedics were called to Clyde North about 10.40am. They are assessing one person at the scene.
First pictures of light aircraft that crash-landed in Clyde North. Paramedics assessing one person, another appears trapped but ok
Another person has been trapped inside the plane but appears to be in a stable condition. An air ambulance has been dispatched to assist in the rescue. More to come.
